title: Makes Me Strong Like Bull
author: Anonymous
citation: Anonymous. "Makes Me Strong Like Bull: experience with Alprazolam (Xanax) (ID 95658)". Erowid.org. Apr 22, 2012. erowid.org/exp/95658
report: I would like to begin this by saying I am the kind of guy that says 'One lay a day, anything more is work.' However one night I decided to take 4 0.5 mg Xanax pills and watch TV for about an hour then go wake up my Partner for some lovin. After a quick 20 minute session I climax and enjoy the rush for a few but suddenly I want more! Long story short about an hour and a half later I had jizzed about a half dozen times and my girl couldn't take any more what so ever. During it all it seemed to highten my sensitivity and make me a more generous lover. I couldn't get enough. To my conclusion Xanax is a great love drug!
